detectors.description:
Reentrancy in MindsyncPlatform.executeProposal(uint256,bytes) (buggy_36.sol#568-612):
	External calls:
	- (success) = p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode) (buggy_36.sol#601)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- MindsyncPlatform.proposals (buggy_36.sol#247) in p.proposalPassed = true (buggy_36.sol#604)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [MindsyncPlatform.executeProposal(uint256,bytes)](buggy_36.sol#L568-L612):
	External calls:
	- [(success) = p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode)](buggy_36.sol#L601)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [MindsyncPlatform.proposals](buggy_36.sol#L247) in [p.proposalPassed = true](buggy_36.sol#L604)

detectors.description: MindsyncPlatform.executeProposal(uint256,bytes) (buggy_36.sol#568-612) has external calls inside a loop: voteWeight = tokenAddress.actualBalanceOf(v.voter) (buggy_36.sol#584)
detectors.markdown: [MindsyncPlatform.executeProposal(uint256,bytes)](buggy_36.sol#L568-L612) has external calls inside a loop: [voteWeight = tokenAddress.actualBalanceOf(v.voter)](buggy_36.sol#L584)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in tokenRecipient.receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) (buggy_36.sol#56-60):

	- require(bool)(t.transferFrom(_from,address(this),_value)) (buggy_36.sol#58)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- receivedTokens(_from,_value,_token,_extraData) (buggy_36.sol#59)

	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [receivedTokens(_from,_value,_token,_extraData)](buggy_36.sol#L59)
